name: Rhythm Reboot
description:
Rhythm Reboot is a procedural generated rhythm game where on EVERY new musical section the environment reboots! :)

We even build-in a level editor where you can import your own songs and make your own levels! :) (and share them with your friends)

!!! You need to run the game with admin rights on, otherwise it doesn't work properly !!!

You can play with keyboard or a controller:

On keyboard: Arrows and WASD

On xbox controller: XYBA 

On PS controller: all shapes


Assets made before the jam:

-the 3D models of benches

-the 3D models of the street lights

-the 3D models of the bins
